## PopperJsPositionerComponent class

Component used for positioning popup element, using popper js

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PopperJsPositionerComponent implements PopperJsPositioner, NgSelectPlugin<PopperJsPositionerOptions>, OnDestroy 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [PopperJsPositioner](./select-popper-js.popperjspositioner.md)<!-- -->, NgSelectPlugin&lt;[PopperJsPositionerOptions](./select-popper-js.popperjspositioneroptions.md)<!-- -->&gt;, OnDestroy
